ud6.4:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud6.4:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula nanatitthiyasamanabrahmanaparibbajaka savatthiyam pativasanti nanaditthika nanakhantika nanarucika nanaditthinissayanissita.
ud6.4:6.2: “tam jivam tam sariram, idameva saccam moghamannan”ti.
ud6.4:7.2: “annam jivam annam sariram, idameva saccam moghamannan”ti.
ud6.4:8.2: “hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannan”ti.
ud6.4:9.2: “na hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannan”ti.
ud6.4:10.2: “hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannan”ti.
ud6.4:11.2: “neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannan”ti.
ud6.4:12.1: Te bhandanajata kalahajata vivadapanna annamannam mukhasattihi vitudanta viharanti:
ud6.4:13.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisimsu.
ud6.4:13.2: Savatthiyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanta yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu.
ud6.4:13.3: Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
ud6.4:14.1: “Idha, bhante, sambahula nanatitthiyasamanabrahmanaparibbajaka savatthiyam pativasanti nanaditthika nanakhantika nanarucika nanaditthinissayanissita—
ud6.4:15.3: te bhandanajata kalahajata vivadapanna annamannam mukhasattihi vitudanta viharanti:
ud6.4:16.2: attham na jananti, anattham na jananti, dhammam na jananti, adhammam na jananti.
ud6.4:16.3: Te attham ajananta anattham ajananta dhammam ajananta adhammam ajananta bhandanajata kalahajata vivadapanna annamannam mukhasattihi vitudanta viharanti:
ud6.4:17.1: Bhutapubbam, bhikkhave, imissayeva savatthiya annataro raja ahosi.
ud6.4:17.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, so raja annataram purisam amantesi:
ud6.4:17.3: ‘ehi tvam, ambho purisa, yavataka savatthiya jaccandha te sabbe ekajjham sannipatehi’ti.
ud6.4:17.4: ‘Evam, deva’ti kho, bhikkhave, so puriso tassa ranno patissutva yavataka savatthiya jaccandha te sabbe gahetva yena so raja tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam rajanam etadavoca:
ud6.4:17.5: ‘sannipatita kho te, deva, yavataka savatthiya jaccandha’ti.
ud6.4:17.7: ‘Evam, deva’ti kho, bhikkhave, so puriso tassa ranno patissutva jaccandhanam hatthim dassesi—
ud6.4:19.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, so puriso jaccandhanam hatthim dassetva yena so raja tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam rajanam etadavoca:
ud6.4:20.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, so raja yena te jaccandha tenupasankami; upasankamitva te jaccandhe etadavoca:
ud6.4:21.1: Yehi, bhikkhave, jaccandhehi hatthissa sisam dittham ahosi, te evamahamsu:
ud6.4:22.1: Yehi, bhikkhave, jaccandhehi hatthissa kanno dittho ahosi, te evamahamsu:
ud6.4:23.1: Yehi, bhikkhave, jaccandhehi hatthissa danto dittho ahosi, te evamahamsu:
ud6.4:24.1: Yehi, bhikkhave, jaccandhehi hatthissa sondo dittho ahosi, te evamahamsu:
ud6.4:25.1: Yehi, bhikkhave, jaccandhehi hatthissa kayo dittho ahosi, te evamahamsu:
ud6.4:26.1: Yehi, bhikkhave, jaccandhehi hatthissa pado dittho ahosi, te evamahamsu:
ud6.4:27.1: Yehi, bhikkhave, jaccandhehi hatthissa satthi dittho ahosi, te evamahamsu:
ud6.4:28.1: Yehi, bhikkhave, jaccandhehi hatthissa nanguttham dittham ahosi, te evamahamsu:
ud6.4:29.1: Yehi, bhikkhave, jaccandhehi hatthissa valadhi dittho ahosi, te evamahamsu:
ud6.4:30.2: nediso hatthi, ediso hatthi’ti annamannam mutthihi samsumbhimsu.
ud6.4:30.3: Tena ca pana, bhikkhave, so raja attamano ahosi.
ud6.4:31.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka andha acakkhuka.
ud6.4:31.2: Te attham na jananti anattham na jananti, dhammam na jananti adhammam na jananti.
ud6.4:31.3: Te attham ajananta anattham ajananta, dhammam ajananta adhammam ajananta bhandanajata kalahajata vivadapanna annamannam mukhasattihi vitudanta viharanti:
ud6.4:32.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
